# peerDiscoveryToken

**Instance Property**

A value that uniquely identifies the other peer in the interaction session.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var peerDiscoveryToken: NIDiscoveryToken { get }
```

## Discussion

NI sets this property to the value of the peer discovery token you pass to the [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyPeerConfiguration/init(peerToken:)] initializer.
title: peerDiscoveryToken
